message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $70. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a fair price considering the product's value, and I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $75 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $79. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm not quite there. I can offer $78 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $79.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
